item.title: Need Help Recruiting Beta Users for an MVP You’re Testing?
item.dc:creator: Andrea Hill
item.description:
If you conduct any sort of customer research, chances are you’re spending too much time finding interviewees, and want to find a better way. One platform we’ve used both to recruit and to test new products ourselves is Erlibird. ErliBird gives you the power to beta test with real people in real environments and collect …
